<Directory />
    	Options FollowSymLinks
    	AllowOverride None
    	Require all denied
    </Directory>
    
    <Directory /usr/share>
    	AllowOverride None
    	Require all granted
    </Directory>
    
    <Directory /var/www/>
    	Options Indexes FollowSymLinks
    	AllowOverride None
    	Require all granted
    </Directory>
